verses.roman:
śloka śuni haridāsa ha-ila ullāsī
nācite lāgilā ślokera artha praśaṁsi'

synonyms: śloka śuni'-hearing this verse; hari-dāsa—Haridāsa Ṭhākura; ha-ilā ullāsī—became very jubilant; nācite lāgilā—he began to dance; ślokera—of the verse; artha praśaṁsi'-praising the meaning.
translation: When Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu chanted this verse, Haridāsa Ṭhākura, upon hearing the vibration, became jubilant and began dancing and praising its meaning.
